title: Viewing Parties at Hoyts?
body: Was just curious if anyone has any info on the viewing parties at hoyts cinemas in AU and NZ. Really excited to see the finals live with my friends like I have done for the last two years yet nothing has been posted by riot or hoyts about the event. Thanks for the help in advance :)

replies.body: Oh man why isn't nsw price the same, one option is $30 the other is $10 for ticket T_T
There isn't any info on the viewing party so far- it most likely will come up on the site after the quarter finals and into the finals. So best to check in a few days after the quarter finals.
Wait a week and a few days to see if any viewing party info comes out. There should be one again this year at Hoyts like the previous years :D

Hey there~ someone posted about this as well and a Rioter replied with this (see below)
> [{quoted}](name=belquin,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=L759wHEM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-20T00:57:16.344+0000)
>
> Sorry for leaving it so late guys - lots of external factors.
> 
> Will be announcing as soon as we can! Stay tuned :D

Comment link/board - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/L759wHEM-worlds-viewing-party-hoyts?comment=0002

So I guess we just wait until further information is released :)
